title: Disaster Preparedness Daily Learning Project: Strengthening Community Resilience

context.prior_knowledge: Basic disaster safety awareness and general familiarity with community activities
context.additional_context: Emphasizes participatory activities using real-life community cases in a smartphone-based informal learning environment.

learning_goals: Identify disaster risk factors in daily activities (family/leisure/work) and propose at least three response strategies
Collaborate with community members to develop and implement practical disaster preparedness action plans
Explain at least five initial response procedures during disasters using smartphone applications

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
